Question
========

We assume that all birth months are equally likely. Marieke was born in March and she will meet two strangers in a meeting. Suppose the events:Ê \
* *A* = the first stranger was born in March,‗.
* *B* = the second stranger is born in March. \ What is the probability that both people Marieke meets have the same birth month as Marieke?

* 1/12
* 2/12

Solution
========
